story:
Nigredo's Debut Needs You!

Embrace our Nigredo moment!  

Nigredo has been meticulously creating and recording a musical effort dense with enigmatic movement and rich exploration of limitless dynamics and soundscapes. The end times has arrived, beckoning the official release of the much-anticipated debut, aptly titled Collapse and Resurrection, by a music collaborative considered "among the city's elite artists, regardless of genre." (LatestDisgrace.com)

Nigredo wants your help in completing what it’s started!

Astute and ever-evolving, the concepts and musical movements on Collapse and Resurrection are where Nigredo place their faith. The quality of production and mastering on this record reflects the live intensity of the individual influences that worked together to create this sonic painting. To capture such dynamic and maintain Nigredo’s truest essence, much care and labor has been poured into producing this debut. With your help, the dreams of these musicians will become available to seep into your own dreams, and the magic is unbound into your hands!  

You can help fund the mastering and vinyl release/distribution of this record.  Once the goal is reached, a vinyl release of Nigredo’s debut will become available for public consumption! A digital master of the full record will be thrown in as a bonus for helping bring the group’s efforts to fruition.  Nigredo also wants to show their support for breast cancer awareness, having been directly affected by breast cancer, like so many. To honor breast cancer survivors and the influence they have in our lives, a percentage of your donation will go towards breast cancer awareness and treatment. Each donation level includes a corresponding percentage dedicated to this worthy cause.

This is not possible without each of us!  

We are filled with appreciation, love, and support from all of you that are able to give.  We are all faced with challenges in how we can deligate financial support to any cause that inspires us.  We can assure you that we are willing, and have sacrificed monumentally for this opportunity.  It is humbling to ask for support.  

With that in mind, if you are unable to finacially support, we know you're reading this for a reason!  You are giving us the encouragement and support we need in other ways.  Please share this opportunity to support with others, and continue to believe in our growth.  We all witness musical expressions that change our lives, and we share the same support to those artists both finacially, and through sharing the music.

www.facebook.com/nigredomusic

www.reverbnation.com/nigredo 

www.soundcloud.com/nigredomusic
story_txt:
Nigredo's Debut Needs You!
Embrace our Nigredo moment!  
Nigredo has been meticulously creating and recording a musical effort dense with enigmatic movement and rich exploration of limitless dynamics and soundscapes. The end times has arrived, beckoning the official release of the much-anticipated debut, aptly titled Collapse and Resurrection, by a music collaborative considered "among the city's elite artists, regardless of genre." (LatestDisgrace.com)Nigredo wants your help in completing what it’s started!
Astute and ever-evolving, the concepts and musical movements on Collapse and Resurrection are where Nigredo place their faith. The quality of production and mastering on this record reflects the live intensity of the individual influences that worked together to create this sonic painting. To capture such dynamic and maintain Nigredo’s truest essence, much care and labor has been poured into producing this debut. With your help, the dreams of these musicians will become available to seep into your own dreams, and the magic is unbound into your hands!  You can help fund the mastering and vinyl release/distribution of this record.  Once the goal is reached, a vinyl release of Nigredo’s debut will become available for public consumption! A digital master of the full record will be thrown in as a bonus for helping bring the group’s efforts to fruition.  Nigredo also wants to show their support for breast cancer awareness, having been directly affected by breast cancer, like so many. To honor breast cancer survivors and the influence they have in our lives, a percentage of your donation will go towards breast cancer awareness and treatment. Each donation level includes a corresponding percentage dedicated to this worthy cause.This is not possible without each of us!  
We are filled with appreciation, love, and support from all of you that are able to give.  We are all faced with challenges in how we can deligate financial support to any cause that inspires us.  We can assure you that we are willing, and have sacrificed monumentally for this opportunity.  It is humbling to ask for support.  
With that in mind, if you are unable to finacially support, we know you're reading this for a reason!  You are giving us the encouragement and support we need in other ways.  Please share this opportunity to support with others, and continue to believe in our growth.  We all witness musical expressions that change our lives, and we share the same support to those artists both finacially, and through sharing the music.

www.facebook.com/nigredomusic
www.reverbnation.com/nigredo 
www.soundcloud.com/nigredomusic

story:
Summary

Greetings from the Speak Music Radio Team! 

My name is Chris Wiley and I am one of the coordinator of the KickBack Music Festival and CEO of Speak Music Radio along with my partner Bridget Price. This year we decided to continue in making a lasting impact on our community. The KickBack Music Festival is an annual event created to unite our communities through the universal means of communication, which is music. The KickBack Music Festival empowers us by introducing you, me and others to various new and innovative music. This music will inspire, uplift and will entice the spirit of unity within our community. The KickBack creates the opportunity for my team and me to showcase various indie and major artist that you and I may like. All performing artist that we choose have music that we believe uplifts us holistically; body, mind and Spirit. It is our altimate goal to share light with the various people in our community. 

We are also teaming up with Non-Profit organizations to raise awareness in support of their ongoing initiatives. We choose organizations that we know are making a profound impact on our immediate community as well as regionally and nationally. Please feel free to support our cause! Our communities need more positive and uplifting entertainment.

What We Need & What You Get

We need you to help  raise $5000 dollar to make this event successful. Your contribution will help us with simply Kickback Expences such as:

  • Facility Cost
  • Equipment Cost
  • Maintenance expenses
  • Artist Fees

Many supporters are already giving toward our event and your donation will help us reach our overall goal.

The benefit for your contribution is listed on the side column.

The Impact

Your contribution is important and with your help we can be successful in promoting togetherness by unifying our community in the fight against many community issues. We are looking to bring joy to people across the community engaging the support from each other. We believe that the impact of what we are doing will change mindsets, stop violence, build character and most of all promote love in human kind.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that many of you can’t give financially but you still want to help. So please help us by getting the word out and join us on www.speakmusicradio.com, Facebook, and/or Twitter (keyword: Speak Music Radio) Also visit www.kickbackfest.org for more information.

story:
Resumen

¡Hola a todos! Somos una banda de mujeres que toca metal sinfónico y hemos estado trabajando arduamente en nuestro material original, del cual hemos ya compartido un par de canciones en público y hemos tenido una respuesta positiva y de mucho apoyo. 

El proceso de hacer música es super gratificante, pero a la vez arduo y requiere mucha dedicación, por lo que nos encantaría ver cómo lo que hemos hecho cobra vida a través de  grabarlo y hacer videos, empezando por nuestra primera bebé, nuestro primer producto: Selene. Asimismo, nos encantaría compartir este material con todos ustedes y con gente de otros lugares del mundo que podría apreciar lo que hacemos.

Es realmente para nosotras un sueño poder hacer esto y les agradeceríamos muchísimo su colaboración <3

¿QUÉ NECESITAMOS?

Esta campaña es para reunir fondos para grabar el video de nuestra canción Selene . Como saben, esto es bastante costoso, ya que requiere de mucho trabajo de profesionales durante muchas horas de dedicación para poder producir un material de excelente calidad. Por ello, cualquier cantidad que deseen enviar será de gran utilidad.

Asimismo, si no podés ayudar con dinero, igual podés ayudarnos enormemente al contarle a otros que quisieran colaborar también.

Estaremos dando algunos productos y regalos a aquellos que nos ayuden, para agradecerles por su colaboración.

Pueden ver más información sobre nosotras en nuestras redes sociales:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ardensluna/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ardensluna/?fbclid=Iw...

¡Muchas gracias por todo su apoyo!

story:
Why record these Psalm in this manner?

I personally find it hard to pray sometimes. I get on my knees with the best of intentions and do just fine for about 30 seconds and then my mind starts the drift. Pretty soon I am thinking about my daily duties, what I'm going to eat for lunch or plans I need to make for tomorrow.

This world, the media and the crazy fast lives we live make it hard to stay connected to God through the day and the irony is that staying connected is the very thing we need to keep ourselves on that even keel we desire so much.

When listening to the demos I have recorded for these songs, I have found it nearly impossible not to sing along with them. Psalms are musical prayers and by singing them we pray and when we pray we stay connected to God and when we are connected, we live in LOVE!

Is anyone among you suffering? He should pray. Is anyone in good spirits? He should sing praise. - James 5:13

story:
Sziasztok!

Greetings!


TÖRTÉNET / STORY (SCROLL FOR ENGLISH)

Mi vagyunk a Leecher, a magyar szimfonikus-cselló metal zenekar. Tudtunkkal rajtunk kívül még senki nem ötvözte a csellók metalbéli használatát (amihez az utat az Apocalyptica járta ki) a nagyzenekari elemekkel. Az első lemezünk, a Sightless, 2016-ban jelent meg, azóta pedig játszottunk itthon, Romániában, Szerbiában, Bulgáriában, Horvátországban, Franciaországban, Németországban, Hollandiában, Olaszországban és Svájcban is.

Most eljött az idő, hogy megtegyük a következő lépést és kiadjuk a második lemezünket. A lehető legjobb zenét szeretnénk kiadni a lehető legjobb minőségben, de! Míg az első lemezünket egy versenygyőzelemnek köszönhettük, most nem áll mögöttünk hasonló forrás és ahhoz, hogy az álmainknak megfelelő minőségben hozhassuk ki a lemezt, szükségünk lesz némi segítségre.
 

STORY

We are Leecher, a Symphonic-Cello Metal band from Hungary. As far as we know, we are the only band that combines using cellos instead of guitars (a concept pioneered by Apocalyptica) with symphonic elements. Our first album ‘Sightless’ came out in 2016 and since then, we have been doing shows at home, and in countries such as Romania, Serbia, Bulgaria, Croatia, France, Germany, The Netherlands, Italy and Switzerland.

Now we want to go one step further and release our second album. We want it to be the best we can possibly do. But here’s the thing: most of our first album was funded by our victory on a contest. Without such a source behind us this time, we will need some help to be able to give something great to our fans.



MIT KÉRÜNK ÉS MIT ADUNK?
 

A lemezünket feltétlenül fel fogjuk venni, de az álmainkban mindezt egy tapasztalt producer mellett tennénk meg, aki a fülével és a tudásával segít minket abban, hogy a lehető legjobb minőséget tehessük az asztalra, a lehető legjobb stúdióban és a legjobb emberekkel dolgozva. Ezen túl egy videóklipet is fogunk készíteni. Minden segítség ezeket a célokat támogatja és rendszeresen jelentkezni is fogunk a színfalak mögül.

November közepén lehetőségünk lesz egyetlen dalt, a Messenger Of Feart felvenni az említett körülmények között, így e hónap végén már hallgatjátok is, hogy pontosan mi is az a minőség, ami az álmainkban szerepel. A segítségetekkel az egész lemezt ugyanezen a színvonalon tudjuk majd megjelentetni!

Mindenki, aki segít nekünk, kapni fog egy digitális letöltést a lemezből. Ha úgy döntesz, hogy többel is hozzájárulsz a sikerünkhöz, különleges tartalmakban részesülhetsz, a kézbe fogható dedikált lemeztől az exkluzív pólókon át egészen a Leecher társasjátékig, amit sok év belső használat után kiadunk!


WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU'LL GET
 

We are going to record our album no matter what, but our dreams include hiring an experienced producer with ears and knowledge to help us bring out maximum potential of our songs, in terms of arrangements and sound; and doing all this in the best studio with the best people we can afford. Also we will release a music video for one of the new songs.

Every cent we get goes toward these goals, and we will report on what is happening.

Thanks to a one-time opportunity, one song is already in the making. By the end of November, you can get a firsthand taste of how our dreams sound like. With your help, we can release an entire album in this quality.

For everyone who helps us out, we will give a digital copy of our album as a sign of gratitude. But if you decide to support us with a higher amount, more exclusuve content awaits you in the form of physical signed CDs, exclusive T-shirts available only through this event, and even a board game we have been playing for years but now we are releasing for you!



HOGYAN SEGÍTHETSZ MÉG?

- Terjeszd a kampány hírét!
- Szólj a barátaidnak, akiknek úgy érzed, tetszhet a zenénk!
- Gyere el a koncertekre!
- Vegyél a koncerteken lemezt vagy pólót - jelenleg minden bevételt a lemezre fordítunk.


HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP

- Spread news of this campaign
- Tell your friends who you believe would like our music
- Come to our shows
- Grab merchandise at our shows - all our income is going towards making the album

 

 

Hálásan köszönjük a segítséget mindenkinek, aki hozzájárul a lemezünk sikeréhez!

We would like to thank everyone who contributes to our success!

But if you decide to support us with a higher amount, more exclusuve content awaits you in the form of physical signed CDs, exclusive T-shirts available only through this event, and even a board game we have been playing for years but now we are releasing for you!HOGYAN SEGÍTHETSZ MÉG?- Terjeszd a kampány hírét!- Szólj a barátaidnak, akiknek úgy érzed, tetszhet a zenénk!- Gyere el a koncertekre!- Vegyél a koncerteken lemezt vagy pólót - jelenleg minden bevételt a lemezre fordítunk.HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP- Spread news of this campaign- Tell your friends who you believe would like our music- Come to our shows- Grab merchandise at our shows - all our income is going towards making the album

story:
Hey everyone!  To those of you who don't know me, my name is Brent Shuttleworth.   I'm a singer and songwriter living in Nashville, TN.  It’s been almost TWO YEARS since the making of my last record ‘FEELS LIKE FLYING.’ I feel so fortunate (thanks to all of you) to have played over 250+ shows in almost every state in the US and met some people that have truly changed my life.  I am trying to raise 20K for this new project.  All told, this project is looking to cost upwards of 30K, however, with your contribution, I hope offset some of that cost.  Here are the 2 main things that I am working on:

1) NEW GROUP OF STUDIO RECORDINGS.  Anyone that knows me, knows that I try to make music that speaks directly to things that I've experienced.  For example, in this new group of recordings, I'm taking on some topics that are honestly, very uncomfortable for me to even talk about.  This includes my own experience with sexual abuse and clinical depression.  My hope is that others that have had a shared experience will find their own healing in this music.   The process of working on this has been really scary and overwhelming, but also something that I know I have to do.  On these recordings, I will be working with my brother and talented songwriter/producer, Mike Shimshack (Britney Spears, Jimmy Robbins, Joe Cocker, Laura Bell Bundy, Forever The Sickest Kids) and my close friend and collaborator producer/songwriter, Kyle Kelso (KYGO, Parachute).  These recordings will be mastered by Randy Merrill (Adele, Justin Bieber, Troye Sivan, Taylor Swift, Ariana Grande).

2) VIDEO CONTENT.  In this new group of recordings, I want to develop a visual counterpart to the new music.  With your contribution, I'll be able to bring another dimension to the artistic experience.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?

A) NEW MUSIC

B) RIDICULOUS INCENTIVES 

C) Your name in the album credits as an EXECUTIVE PRODUCER 

D) NEW MERCHANDISE

Thank you so incredibly much for your unwavering support.  I am deeply humbled by everything that you have done and continue to do.  It means everything to me.  Also, if you don't have any funds to contribute to this campaign, THAT'S OK.  If you feel comfortable, feel free to share this on social media far and wide.  Hope to see everyone on the road again very soon.

story:
Let's Help Luke!

In order to create the next 2 song parodies Luke Ski wants to create, he needs to raise $705.  The first $220 will be enough for 1 song, and the other $485 is for the 2nd (longer and more complicated) parody. All of these numbers are based on Math, and agreements made with the instrumentalist for the next two songs, the talented Jace McLain of Needlejuice Records and Nuclear Bubble Wrap.

 

MarsCon 2020 deadline is January 28th!

The deadline by which we need to raise these goal amounts of money to ensure the songs will have their backing tracks created, vocals recorded, and final mixes done in time for Luke to perform them at MarsCon 2020 is January 28th, 2020. If we hit the goal of $220 by Jan. 28th, that will cover the first song, which Luke will world premiere at MarsCon 2020, and will be posted at TheFuMP.com as a free download on the Tuesday following MarsCon, March 3rd, 2020. If we hit the goal of $705 (an additional $485) by Jan. 28th, that will cover the second song, which Luke will world premiere at MarsCon 2020. Luke (currently) intends that song to be an album-only track, but he will email an MP3 of the finished track to everyone who donated so they can have it early. If we do not hit either of these goals by Jan. 28th, then the songs will be made at a later date, and won't be premiered at MarsCon 2020 (or posted at the FuMP) until whenever they are finished.

 

Get Some Nifty Perks!

Our beloved and talented storyboard artist (as once seen on Mighty Magiswords on Cartoon Network) will create some custom art for you, if you give at the $50 or $100 level. Other possible perks include a USB drive containing most of Luke's music (along with digital downloads containing most of the rest of his music), a custom Vlog of Luke talking about the origins and making of the Luke Ski song of your choice, and a thank you card. Literally everyone who gives at least 1 dollar will get a shout out on our podcast, Luke and Carrie's Bad Rapport.

 

NOTE: Luke retains the right to veto both (A.) the Luke Ski Song you wish for him to talk about in the video, and (B.) the content which you are requesting him to draw for the drawings. If you wish to share your Luke Ski Song choice or Drawing Request with Luke before you donate to make sure it is / they are something Luke is okay with, feel free to contact him by emailing thegreatlukeski@gmail.com to discuss it with him.

 

Be a part of the process!

Your generous patronage will help Luke Ski continue to create music even while between animation gigs. You also get nifty perks all for yourself!

 

Risks, schmisks!

All money raised, regardless if we're nowhere near our goal or way above it, will be sent to Jace McLain for the purposes of creating new Luke Ski instrumentals.
story_txt: Let's Help Luke!In order to create the next 2 song parodies Luke Ski wants to create, he needs to raise $705.  The first $220 will be enough for 1 song, and the other $485 is for the 2nd (longer and more complicated) parody. All of these numbers are based on Math, and agreements made with the instrumentalist for the next two songs, the talented Jace McLain of Needlejuice Records and Nuclear Bubble Wrap. MarsCon 2020 deadline is January 28th!The deadline by which we need to raise these goal amounts of money to ensure the songs will have their backing tracks created, vocals recorded, and final mixes done in time for Luke to perform them at MarsCon 2020 is January 28th, 2020. If we hit the goal of $220 by Jan. 28th, that will cover the first song, which Luke will world premiere at MarsCon 2020, and will be posted at TheFuMP.com as a free download on the Tuesday following MarsCon, March 3rd, 2020. If we hit the goal of $705 (an additional $485) by Jan. 28th, that will cover the second song, which Luke will world premiere at MarsCon 2020. Luke (currently) intends that song to be an album-only track, but he will email an MP3 of the finished track to everyone who donated so they can have it early. If we do not hit either of these goals by Jan. 28th, then the songs will be made at a later date, and won't be premiered at MarsCon 2020 (or posted at the FuMP) until whenever they are finished. Get Some Nifty Perks!Our beloved and talented storyboard artist (as once seen on Mighty Magiswords on Cartoon Network) will create some custom art for you, if you give at the $50 or $100 level. Other possible perks include a USB drive containing most of Luke's music (along with digital downloads containing most of the rest of his music), a custom Vlog of Luke talking about the origins and making of the Luke Ski song of your choice, and a thank you card. Literally everyone who gives at least 1 dollar will get a shout out on our podcast, Luke and Carrie's Bad Rapport. NOTE: Luke retains the right to veto both (A.) the Luke Ski Song you wish for him to talk about in the video, and (B.) the content which you are requesting him to draw for the drawings. story:
We are a couple of years in and want to make a record, a full album complete with a bunch of songs, cool cover art, lyric sheet, the whole works. Something that would keep your attention the whole bus ride home from the record store..

We don’t wanna wait for a label, we wanna do this the way we see fit. Let's hear it for being independent, right? 

That being said, we are artists- not investment bankers, so our pockets are pretty shallow and we would like to do this right.

The lack of income from merch sales and live shows in 2020 has been a real bummer and that was money we were planning on putting straight into this album. So, we are looking for investors in our band, our ideas, our passion. We are asking for $5K to get it recorded, mixed and printed on vinyl.  

We aren’t asking for something and giving nothing back, though.. hell, no. There will be incentives!  Starting with copies of the vinyl and other giveaways.. who knows what a couple of painter/ musicians might have up their sleeve? We promise that as a contributor, we will take care of you with good tunes, a good product and really cool incentives. Thank you in advance for your help.

story:
Deeper Upper by Vidas Černiauskas

 

THE BAND

Deeper Upper puts together synthesized sounds, powerful drum beats and sophisticated guitar effects to create stories of a modern human being in digital era. Deeper Upper is a four-piece band from Lithuania, which has already secured its place among indie scene‘s bands in the Baltic states. Since their first appearance in 2010, the band has released two EPs: “Structures” (2013) and “Ceremony” (2015). Deeper Upper has already performed at the biggest music festivals in the Baltics – “Positivus” and “Tallinn Music Week”. Moreover, the band took 1st place in the international music competition “EuroMusic Contest” in 2014, where they won a three-day recording session at the prestigious Black Rock Studio in Santorini, Greece. The band was nominated for The Best Upcoming Band and The Best Music Video (“Unity”) at the Lithuanian Music Awards this year.

 

IDEA OF MUSIC VIDEO

Young or “twenty something” people from Lithuania have no link, no background to the past generation free behaviour and that’s why they are called “the Virgin” generation - the first 'free living' generation after Lithuania restored its independence (1990).  Majority of them face the pollution of opinions, influences and rules caused by past generation which was formed in Soviet Union. This resonates to conclusion, that this generation face a conflict that only lives in their heads formed by others. It’s a “virgin” generation that left school and opened it’s lives to the world.

 

HOW?

We are going to use four characters who are in their late twenties. The main idea is to create a story that reflects to the new age generation. It is going to be “school uniformed” adults.

It’s a visual essay dedicated to all the young people who started to form their values and beliefs after Lithuania became independent. Although, people became free, young people still have to deal with totalitaristic influence caused by past generation.

The music video will illustrate the conflict between these two generations, their opinions and beliefs, values and dreams. 

 

MOOD & FEEL

Although music video has a script and strict storyline it’s going to be more chaotic in the final edit creating us a combination of different shots that reflects characters feelings.

Fast and slow tempo, mixed camera techniques will create a sense of inner conflict and the main struggle of trying to be free.

The main goal is to create a visual essay of characters feelings, clothes textures, architecture atmospheres and certain actions symbols.

 

MONEY WILL BE USED FOR

All the money raised by the campaign will cover a part of production costs.

-Lights & Grips

-Transportation

-Permits

-Set design

-Wardrobe  

 

WHAT IS ALREADY FUNDED

-Camera + accessories

-Post-production

-Crew labor

 

CREW

 

Director / Writer Saulius Baradinskas 

 

Director of Photography Vytautas Katkus

 

Costume Designer Flore Vauville

 

Production Designer Vladas Dautartas

 

Associate Producer Avelina Markevičiūtė

 

Producer Viktorija Seniut

 

Thank you for your attention and support!

..and...

If you have any questions regarding production or want to take part in our project, don't hesitate and feel free to contact us via email:

info@viktoriafilms.com

story:
What have I done?


I’ve finally got my first EP finished, mastered and ready to release! Some of these songs I started 4 years ago, and they’ve since been picked over, pumped up and perfected about a million times with the help of some great people. I can’t wait for you to hear them (you can hear previews of each one playing in the background of the video).

We also made a music video which I am so proud of, I think it’ll knock your socks right off and into the washing basket!

 

Why has it taken this long?


Two main things: lack of confidence and lack of cash. The confidence I’m working on by talking and listening to wonderful friends, collaborators and teachers, and reading lots of agony aunt advice columns (obvs). The money thing though is where you can help...

I have already scrounged from friends for mixing, graphic design, directing, additional production, performances, recording time; and paid for singing lessons, equipment, recording time and mastering myself, just to MAKE THE MUSIC.

 

What am I asking for?


Now the music is made and I want to get as many people to hear it as possible and ideally get it in the hands and ears of people who can help me make the next EP (mostly done!) reach even more people. SO I am asking you to give any of your pennies (pref. pounds) to help me pay for PR and advertising costs so I can get this thing OUT and featured on all the blogs and your radios.

 

How much do I need?

Since I recognise my fan base is relatively small I’m only aiming for £500 right now, though I expect a 6-8 week PR campaign to cost at least double that so pls keep on donating even if I get to £500!

What will you get when you donate?

  • A digital download of the EP (4 songs) as soon as it’s released
  • A CD copy of the EP with custom designed CD case
  • A digital download of alternate ACOUSTIC versions of all 4 songs on the EP, specially made for this campaign (sounding something like THIS)
  • Specially designed postcards of my depressing lyrics* that you can send to all of your friends (*not ALL of the lyrics are depressing)
  • A guitar or ukulele lesson from me, at your house! (see my website www.aliceemerson.com for my credentials)
  • I’ll record a cover of any song you want!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I get it, none of us have any money, just sharing the campaign with your friends/family, and especially sharing the music once it comes out in a couple of months, is super helpful. It'll all be coming up on my website or facebook. Oh, and like my facebook page!

 

Thanks to these people for helping make the EP!

Alex Walker - additional production
Alex Bloxham - bass
Graeme Wiley - mixing
Ed Woods - mastering
Marc Pell - recording
Jim Barne - recording
Polly Hewett - vocal coaching
Simon Clark - directing
Geraldine Nassieu-Maupas - graphic design
Anna Emerson - copywriting, cutting things out neatly, providing emotional support
Sigrid Jakobsen - hair styling, general badassery

 

and thanks to you for reading this far!

Alice x

story:
-------------------------------------------FRANÇAIS PLUS BAS--------------------------------------------

Who are we?

We are WOODWOLF, a drum/guitar duo from Quebec City, Canada. Founded in 2013 by singer, guitar player and songwriter Frederic Moffet.

Following the departure of the ex group members, we have evolved into our actual duo with the arrival of drummer Alex Boutin. Since then we have participated in different band contests and played many shows in the underground music scene. After two years of refining our own music we were ready to take up a new challenge which was to create our first album: « Golden Road ».

This album is the accomplishment of many years of hard labour. We had to record our songs in order to share our music with our actual fans and to conquer new audiences. We had the opportunity to work with Dominic Pelletier ("Caravane" and "The Hunters") as the producer and David Lizotte ("Hillward" and sound engineer ) for the recording. We are extremely proud of the result and eager for you to hear it! We were also privileged to have David Paul Seymour, ("The Art of Rock and Roll") for the album cover artwork. (http://davidpaulseymour.com/).

The recording now completed , we offer you the album’s presale and the derived products to help us finalize and realize our project.

What we’ll use the money for

The money raised in this campaign will permit us to print copies of CD’s, t-shirts, to do the marketing and promotion of the album (radios, papers, blogs ,social media) to organize our release concert, etc.

In order to help you help us, here are various options you can choose from:

What you will obtain

***IMPORTANT: MERCHANDISE MUST BE PICKED UP AT THE RELEASE CONCERT JUNE 1ST 2018 IN QUEBEC CITY. IF YOU CAN'T PICK IT UP, WE WILL CONTACT SHORTLY AFTER THE SHOW TO SHIP IT TO YOU BY MAIL AND ADDITIONNAL FEES WILL APPLY.***


Depending on the package you choose you will obtain the following items:

-Digital Album: A digital download code sent by email before the album’s official release.

-Release Concert ticket: You will receive by email or by mail a ticket for our release concert on June 1st, 2018 at the “L'Anti Bar et Spectacles" in Quebec City, Canada.

https://www.facebook.com/events/1652427141512297/

- Signed Copy of CD Album: A "Golden Road" CD album signed by the members of WOODWOLF.

-T-Shirt: A "Golden Road" T-shirt offered in sizes small, medium, large, XL

-Signed Poster : A signed WOODWOLF poster

-Sticker: A "Golden Road" sticker.

-Peace in the Field Fest Pass: You will obtain a pass for the entire “Peace in the Field” festival which takes place from June 8th to June 10th 2018 in St-Sabine, Quebec and have the opportunity to assist to our performance on friday night. The pass entitles you to the two days of shows plus camping on the premises. For more information please visit: https://www.facebook.com/festivalpeaceinthefield/

-Private Show: You’ll have the opportunity to welcome WOODWOLF for an in-house private concert! You can choose our “local option” (within 100 km) or our “away option” (within 500 km).

-Desert Trip with WOODWOLF: The ultimate experience! A trip for two people on the "Golden Road" with WOODWOLF! You’ll visit the Grand Canyon with us. An unforgettable adventure!! (The price only includes the flying costs, the hotel for five nights and the trip to the Grand Canyon. We will contact you after the campaign to set up the trip.)

Why contribute?

Our objective is to accumulate $2,500. The more you contribute the more you will help us towards the success of our album. We already have personally invested a lot of our own money and now we need your contribution. It would be greatly appreciated and would permit us to take a step forward in our formation. Who knows? Maybe bring our music worldwide!!

Other ways to help us

Don’t hesitate to share our campaign with friends, family and colleagues through social medias or in person. The more people know about us the better it will be!

Follow us on Facebook, Youtube, on our Bandcamp page and other platforms (Instagram, Spotify, Apple Music, etc.)

https://www.instagram.com/woodwolf_qc/?hl=fr-ca

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2g4rRXobDarnq...

Stay on the lookout on our Facebook page for more of our music extracts, events and promotions before the opening show! To be the first on line, please click “Like” then “ following” then select « see first ».

https://www.facebook.com/woodwolf.music/

 

Thank you for your interest in this campaign! You make our dreams and our goals a reality!

 

-----------------------------------------------------FRANÇAIS-----------------------------------------------------

 

Résumé:

Actif depuis 2013, WOODWOLF évolua en un duo drum et guitar en 2015. Croisement entre le rock, le grunge et le psychédélique, nous agençons plusieurs influences musicales, ce qui nous confère un style vintage et planant. Avec 11 chansons originales déjà enregistrées et masterisées, nous vous offrons une prévente d'album et des produits dérivés afin de nous aider à finaliser les dernières étapes du lancements de notre premier album "Golden Road".

Qui sommes nous?

Nous sommes WOODWOLF, un duo drum et guitare de Québec au Canada. Le band fut fondé en 2013 par Frédéric Moffet, chanteur, guitariste et auteur des chansons du groupe.

Originalement un trio, nous avons évolué sous la forme d'un duo en 2015 suite au départ des ex-membres du groupe et à l'arrivée du drummer Alex Boutin. Depuis, nous avons participé à quelques concours et joué dans plusieurs spectacles de la scène underground de la région de Québec. Après deux ans à peaufiner nos propres compositions semaines après semaines, nous étions prêts pour un nouveau défi, celui de lancer notre premier album "Golden Road".   

Cet album est l'accomplissement de notre travail acharné depuis plusieurs années. Il nous fallait immortaliser nos chansons en les enregistrant et ainsi pouvoir partager notre musique avec une audience plus large que celle qui vient nous voir en spectacle. Nous voulions aussi offrir à nos fans la possibilité de nous écouter partout avec un enregistrement bien produit et plus travaillé que les démos que nous avions déjà sur notre page Bandcamp. Nous avons donc saisi l’opportunité de travailler avec Dominic Pelletier (auteur-compositeur-interprète dans "Caravane" et "The Hunters") en tant que réalisateur et David Lizotte (auteur-compositeur-interprète dans "Hillward" et technicien de son pour "Caravane") à l'enregistrement. Nous sommes extrêmement fiers du résultat et nous avons hâte de vous le faire entendre! De plus, nous avons fait affaire avec David Paul Seymour, "Th Art of Rock and Roll", pour la réalisation de notre pochette d'album (http://davidpaulseymour.com/). 

Nous avons par contre besoin de votre aide pour finaliser le tout! L'enregistrement des chansons maintenant chose faites, nous vous offrons une prévente d'album et de produits dérivés pour finir de financer le projet!

À quoi servira l'argent?

Les fonds récoltés dans cette campagne serviront à la mise en marché de l'album, à l'impression de copies physiques sous forme de CD, à finir de payer l'enregistrement, à l'organisation du spectacle de lancement, à l'impression de t-shirt (et autres produits dérivés), à la promotion du band sur les réseaux socios, etc. 

Nous vous avons concocté différents forfaits qui vous offrent une panoplie d'articles intéressants et qui permettent à tous les budgets de contribuer! 

 Ce que vous obtiendrez

***IMPORTANT: VOUS DEVREZ PASSER CHERCHER VOTRE MARCHANDISE LE SOIR DU LANCEMENT LE 1ER JUIN À QUÉBEC. SI IL VOUS EST IMPOSSIBLE DE VENIR, NOUS VOUS CONTACTERONS PEU DE TEMPS APRÈS LE CONCERT POUR VOUS L'ENVOYER PAR LA POSTE ET DES FRAIS ADDITIONNELS S'APPLIQUERONT  ***

Tout dépendant du forfait vous choisirez, vous aurez droit à un ou plusieurs des articles suivants;

-Digital Download Copy of Album: Un copie de l'album en format digital vous sera envoyée par email avant la sortie officielle de l'album.

-Release Concert Ticket: Vous recevrez par email un billet pour le concert de lancement qui aura lui le 1er Juin 2018 à "L'Anti Bar et Spectacles" à Québec au Canada.

https://www.facebook.com/events/1652427141512297/

-Signed Copy of CD Album: Vous aurez une copie en version CD de l'album "Golden Road" signée par les membres de WOODWOLF.

-T-Shirt: Vous aurez un chandail à l'effigie de l'album "Golden Road", offert dans les grandeurs small, medium, large, XL et XXL

-Signed Poster: Vous aurez un poster signé par WOODWOLF.

Sticker: Vous aurez un autocollant de "Golden Road".

-Peace in the Field Fest Pass: Vous aurez la chance d'assister à notre prestation le 8 Juin 2018 live à "Peace in the Field"! Vous obtiendrez un laissez-passer complet pour le festival à Ste-Sabine au Québec du 7 au 10 Juin 2018, incluant les deux jours de spectacle et le camping sur place. Programmation et infos: https://www.facebook.com/festivalpeaceinthefield/

-Private Show: vous aurez la chance de recevoir WOODWOLF chez vous pour un concert privé! Vous pouvez choisir l'option (LOCAL) qui doit être dans un rayon de 100 km de la ville de Québec ou (AWAY) qui doit être dans un rayon de 500 km.

-Desert Trip with WOODWOLF: Vivez l'expérience ultime, un voyage pour une personne sur le "Golden Road" avec les membres de WOODWOLF! Vous irez visiter le Grand Canyon avec les membres du band, une aventure inoubliable! ( Le prix inclus seulement les frais d'avion, l'hotel pour cinq nuits et le voyage au Grand Canyon. Vous serez contacté après la campagne pour les arrangement du voyage.)

 Pourquoi Contribuer?

Nous avons un objectif de 2500$, plus vous contribuerez, plus aiderez à faire de la sortie de notre album un succès! Nous avons déjà investi beaucoup de notre propre argent, votre contribution pourrait être le coup de pouce supplémentaire qui amènera notre formation à un niveau supérieur et qui sait, à faire connaitre notre musique à des gens de partout dans le monde!

De plus, nous vous offrons des contreparties très intéressantes qui n'ont rien à envier aux autres projets, vous en avez vraiment pour votre argent!      

 D'autres façons d'aider

Vous pouvez aider notre cause en passant le message aux gens que vous connaissez pour qu'ils contribuent eux aussi au succès de notre album. N'hésitez pas à partager la campagne sur les réseaux sociaux afin de la faire connaitre par le plus grand nombre de gens possibles.

De plus, vous pouvez nous suivre sur notre page Facebook, ainsi que sur notre chaîne Youtube, sur notre page Bandcamp et sur diverses plateformes (Spotify, Apple Music, Instagram, Twitter, etc.)

https://www.instagram.com/woodwolf_qc/?hl=fr-ca

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2g4rRXobDarnq...

Restez à l'affût, nous sortirons d'autres extraits avant le lancement. Aussi surveillez-nous dates de spectacles et promotions sur notre page Facebook. En cliquant "J'aime" sur notre page, vous serez au courant de toutes les nouvelles du band.

https://www.facebook.com/woodwolf.music/

 

Merci de votre intérêt pour cette campagne, vous faites de notre rêve une réalité!

After two years of refining our own music we were ready to take up a new challenge which was to create our first album: « Golden Road ».
This album is the accomplishment of many years of hard labour. We had to record our songs in order to share our music with our actual fans and to conquer new audiences. We had the opportunity to work with Dominic Pelletier ("Caravane" and "The Hunters") as the producer and David Lizotte ("Hillward" and sound engineer ) for the recording. We are extremely proud of the result and eager for you to hear it! We were also privileged to have David Paul Seymour, ("The Art of Rock and Roll") for the album cover artwork. (http://davidpaulseymour.com/).


The recording now completed , we offer you the album’s presale and the derived products to help us finalize and realize our project.
What we’ll use the money for
The money raised in this campaign will permit us to print copies of CD’s, t-shirts, to do the marketing and promotion of the album (radios, papers, blogs ,social media) to organize our release concert, etc.
In order to help you help us, here are various options you can choose from:
What you will obtain
***IMPORTANT: MERCHANDISE MUST BE PICKED UP AT THE RELEASE CONCERT JUNE 1ST 2018 IN QUEBEC CITY. IF YOU CAN'T PICK IT UP, WE WILL CONTACT SHORTLY AFTER THE SHOW TO SHIP IT TO YOU BY MAIL AND ADDITIONNAL FEES WILL APPLY.***
Depending on the package you choose you will obtain the following items:
-Digital Album: A digital download code sent by email before the album’s official release.
-Release Concert ticket: You will receive by email or by mail a ticket for our release concert on June 1st, 2018 at the “L'Anti Bar et Spectacles" in Quebec City, Canada.
https://www.facebook.com/events/1652427141512297/
- Signed Copy of CD Album: A "Golden Road" CD album signed by the members of WOODWOLF.
-T-Shirt: A "Golden Road" T-shirt offered in sizes small, medium, large, XL
-Signed Poster : A signed WOODWOLF poster
-Sticker: A "Golden Road" sticker.
-Peace in the Field Fest Pass: You will obtain a pass for the entire “Peace in the Field” festival which takes place from June 8th to June 10th 2018 in St-Sabine, Quebec and have the opportunity to assist to our performance on friday night. The pass entitles you to the two days of shows plus camping on the premises. For more information please visit: https://www.facebook.com/festivalpeaceinthefield/
-Private Show: You’ll have the opportunity to welcome WOODWOLF for an in-house private concert! You can choose our “local option” (within 100 km) or our “away option” (within 500 km).
-Desert Trip with WOODWOLF: The ultimate experience! A trip for two people on the "Golden Road" with WOODWOLF! You’ll visit the Grand Canyon with us. An unforgettable adventure!! (The price only includes the flying costs, the hotel for five nights and the trip to the Grand Canyon. We will contact you after the campaign to set up the trip.)
Why contribute?
Our objective is to accumulate $2,500. The more you contribute the more you will help us towards the success of our album. We already have personally invested a lot of our own money and now we need your contribution. It would be greatly appreciated and would permit us to take a step forward in our formation. Who knows? Maybe bring our music worldwide!!
Other ways to help us
Don’t hesitate to share our campaign with friends, family and colleagues through social medias or in person. The more people know about us the better it will be!
Follow us on Facebook, Youtube, on our Bandcamp page and other platforms (Instagram, Spotify, Apple Music, etc.)
https://www.instagram.com/woodwolf_qc/?hl=fr-ca
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2g4rRXobDarnq...
Stay on the lookout on our Facebook page for more of our music extracts, events and promotions before the opening show! To be the first on line, please click “Like” then “ following” then select « see first ».
https://www.facebook.com/woodwolf.music/
 
Thank you for your interest in this campaign! You make our dreams and our goals a reality!
 
-----------------------------------------------------FRANÇAIS-----------------------------------------------------
 
Résumé:
Actif depuis 2013, WOODWOLF évolua en un duo drum et guitar en 2015. Croisement entre le rock, le grunge et le psychédélique, nous agençons plusieurs influences musicales, ce qui nous confère un style vintage et planant. Avec 11 chansons originales déjà enregistrées et masterisées, nous vous offrons une prévente d'album et des produits dérivés afin de nous aider à finaliser les dernières étapes du lancements de notre premier album "Golden Road".
Qui sommes nous?
Nous sommes WOODWOLF, un duo drum et guitare de Québec au Canada. Le band fut fondé en 2013 par Frédéric Moffet, chanteur, guitariste et auteur des chansons du groupe.
Originalement un trio, nous avons évolué sous la forme d'un duo en 2015 suite au départ des ex-membres du groupe et à l'arrivée du drummer Alex Boutin. Depuis, nous avons participé à quelques concours et joué dans plusieurs spectacles de la scène underground de la région de Québec. Après deux ans à peaufiner nos propres compositions semaines après semaines, nous étions prêts pour un nouveau défi, celui de lancer notre premier album "Golden Road".   
Cet album est l'accomplissement de notre travail acharné depuis plusieurs années. Il nous fallait immortaliser nos chansons en les enregistrant et ainsi pouvoir partager notre musique avec une audience plus large que celle qui vient nous voir en spectacle. Nous voulions aussi offrir à nos fans la possibilité de nous écouter partout avec un enregistrement bien produit et plus travaillé que les démos que nous avions déjà sur notre page Bandcamp. Nous avons donc saisi l’opportunité de travailler avec Dominic Pelletier (auteur-compositeur-interprète dans "Caravane" et "The Hunters") en tant que réalisateur et David Lizotte (auteur-compositeur-interprète dans "Hillward" et technicien de son pour "Caravane") à l'enregistrement. Nous sommes extrêmement fiers du résultat et nous avons hâte de vous le faire entendre! De plus, nous avons fait affaire avec David Paul Seymour, "Th Art of Rock and Roll", pour la réalisation de notre pochette d'album (http://davidpaulseymour.com/). 


Nous avons par contre besoin de votre aide pour finaliser le tout! L'enregistrement des chansons maintenant chose faites, nous vous offrons une prévente d'album et de produits dérivés pour finir de financer le projet!
À quoi servira l'argent?
Les fonds récoltés dans cette campagne serviront à la mise en marché de l'album, à l'impression de copies physiques sous forme de CD, à finir de payer l'enregistrement, à l'organisation du spectacle de lancement, à l'impression de t-shirt (et autres produits dérivés), à la promotion du band sur les réseaux socios, etc. 
Nous vous avons concocté différents forfaits qui vous offrent une panoplie d'articles intéressants et qui permettent à tous les budgets de contribuer! 

 Ce que vous obtiendrez
***IMPORTANT: VOUS DEVREZ PASSER CHERCHER VOTRE MARCHANDISE LE SOIR DU LANCEMENT LE 1ER JUIN À QUÉBEC. SI IL VOUS EST IMPOSSIBLE DE VENIR, NOUS VOUS CONTACTERONS PEU DE TEMPS APRÈS LE CONCERT POUR VOUS L'ENVOYER PAR LA POSTE ET DES FRAIS ADDITIONNELS S'APPLIQUERONT  ***
Tout dépendant du forfait vous choisirez, vous aurez droit à un ou plusieurs des articles suivants;
-Digital Download Copy of Album: Un copie de l'album en format digital vous sera envoyée par email avant la sortie officielle de l'album.
-Release Concert Ticket: Vous recevrez par email un billet pour le concert de lancement qui aura lui le 1er Juin 2018 à "L'Anti Bar et Spectacles" à Québec au Canada.
https://www.facebook.com/events/1652427141512297/
-Signed Copy of CD Album: Vous aurez une copie en version CD de l'album "Golden Road" signée par les membres de WOODWOLF.
-T-Shirt: Vous aurez un chandail à l'effigie de l'album "Golden Road", offert dans les grandeurs small, medium, large, XL et XXL
-Signed Poster: Vous aurez un poster signé par WOODWOLF.
Sticker: Vous aurez un autocollant de "Golden Road".
-Peace in the Field Fest Pass: Vous aurez la chance d'assister à notre prestation le 8 Juin 2018 live à "Peace in the Field"! Vous obtiendrez un laissez-passer complet pour le festival à Ste-Sabine au Québec du 7 au 10 Juin 2018, incluant les deux jours de spectacle et le camping sur place. Programmation et infos: https://www.facebook.com/festivalpeaceinthefield/
-Private Show: vous aurez la chance de recevoir WOODWOLF chez vous pour un concert privé! Vous pouvez choisir l'option (LOCAL) qui doit être dans un rayon de 100 km de la ville de Québec ou (AWAY) qui doit être dans un rayon de 500 km.
-Desert Trip with WOODWOLF: Vivez l'expérience ultime, un voyage pour une personne sur le "Golden Road" avec les membres de WOODWOLF! Vous irez visiter le Grand Canyon avec les membres du band, une aventure inoubliable! ( Le prix inclus seulement les frais d'avion, l'hotel pour cinq nuits et le voyage au Grand Canyon. Vous serez contacté après la campagne pour les arrangement du voyage.)
 Pourquoi Contribuer?
Nous avons un objectif de 2500$, plus vous contribuerez, plus aiderez à faire de la sortie de notre album un succès! Nous avons déjà investi beaucoup de notre propre argent, votre contribution pourrait être le coup de pouce supplémentaire qui amènera notre formation à un niveau supérieur et qui sait, à faire connaitre notre musique à des gens de partout dans le monde!
De plus, nous vous offrons des contreparties très intéressantes qui n'ont rien à envier aux autres projets, vous en avez vraiment pour votre argent!      

 D'autres façons d'aider
Vous pouvez aider notre cause en passant le message aux gens que vous connaissez pour qu'ils contribuent eux aussi au succès de notre album. N'hésitez pas à partager la campagne sur les réseaux sociaux afin de la faire connaitre par le plus grand nombre de gens possibles.
De plus, vous pouvez nous suivre sur notre page Facebook, ainsi que sur notre chaîne Youtube, sur notre page Bandcamp et sur diverses plateformes (Spotify, Apple Music, Instagram, Twitter, etc.)
https://www.instagram.com/woodwolf_qc/?hl=fr-ca
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2g4rRXobDarnq...
Restez à l'affût, nous sortirons d'autres extraits avant le lancement. Aussi surveillez-nous dates de spectacles et promotions sur notre page Facebook. En cliquant "J'aime" sur notre page, vous serez au courant de toutes les nouvelles du band.
https://www.facebook.com/woodwolf.music/
 Merci de votre intérêt pour cette campagne, vous faites de notre rêve une réalité!

story:
UNE DERNIÈRE FOIS

(dirigez-vous vers mcleanlove.com pour entendre un extrait du single)

« Une Dernière fois »  est mon deuxième album avec le projet Mclean. L'histoire débute, comme tout bon film d'horreur, dans un chalet isolé. J'arrive avec une guitare, une plume à encre 0.7 mm, du papier manuscrit jaunis et une carabine Olympia. Comme dans une image before/after infopub, j'émerge deux semaines plus tard avec 11 nouvelles chansons. 

Je m'entoure d'amis et de bêtes musicales pour l'enregistrement au studio Little Bullhorn: Olivier Fairfield (FET.NAT, Timber Timbre) à la co-prod et la batterie, Sebastien Perry à la régie, Sarah Bradley (Fevers) à la voix et Jordan Mcneil aux claviers. Le tout est ensuite mixé par Stéphane Rancourt (Jean Leloup, Nicolas Gémus) et matricé par Ryan Morey à Greymarket Mastering. 

Une dernière fois is my second album with the project MCLEAN. The story begins, like all good horror movies, in an isolated cabin. I lock myself up with a guitar, a 0.7 mm liquid ink pen, yellowed sheet music and an Olympia sing-song machine. Like in an infomercial's before/after shot, I come out 2 weeks later with 11 brand-spanking songs. 

I surround myself with a great team to cut the album at Little Bullhorn studio : Olivier Fairfield (FET.NAT, Timber Timbre) as co-producer and drummer, Sebastien Perry on sound, Sarah Bradley (Fevers) on back vocals and Jordan Mcneil on keys. The album is then mixed by Stephane Rancourt (Jean Leloup, Nicolas Gémus) and mastered by Ryan Morey at Greymarket mastering.  

 

BUDGET

Avec mon investissement personnel et l'aide financière des conseils des arts, tous les aspects de production sont financé, incluant les musiciens, le studio et le mix. Votre contribution sera utilisé pour la duplication physique et certains coûts de post-productions (mixing/mastering). 

With personal investments and the help from various public music funds, I was able to cover all production costs, including studio, mixing and musicians. Your contribution will go toward printing the album and a few post-production costs (mixing/mastering).

 

CONTRIBUTION

Il y a plusieurs options pour contribuer. Vous pouvez utilisez cette levée de fond pour faire une pré-commande de l'album ou si vous voulez contribuer en extra, il y a des super perks limités qui incluent: CDs, vinyles, pins, t-shirts, un take-home show, pour en nommer quelques-un!

There are many ways you can contribute. You can use this fundraiser as an opportunity to pre-order the album or if you feel like contributing further, there are awesome and limited perks that include:  CDs, vinyls, pins, t-shirts, a take-home show, to name a few!

 

JE T'AIME J'AI PAS DE CASH/LOVE YOU THOUGH NO DOUGH

Si vous n'avez pas de $ mais vous avez quand même pris le temps de lire jusqu'ici (grozamour) vous pouvez m'aider en partageant les liens sur vos réseaux sociaux ou en passant le mot aux personnes physiques de vos vies sociales. 

If you can't contribute $ but you still took the time to read all of this (truluv) you can still help out by sharing links on your social networks or by talking about it with real-life friends.

story:
Hello. 

I'm glad you've made it to my page.

 I am Vinay Kaushal. I am a composer and guitar player currently based in Pune, India. I mainly write, compose and play music for my collective 'The Vinay Kaushal Collective' and the world music act 'Empty Cafe' among other projects. 

I am also an official endorsee for Fender India and Ernie Ball Strings. That has been really great!

The Album

I started working on my first album soon after music school and I have composed, mixed and produced this album on my own so far. Many of the songs have been inspired by real events around me including the title track.

Besides me, 11 incredibly talented musicians from around the world have played on this album so far. I have had bass lines recorded and sent to me from as far as Los Angeles and saxophones from England. Some songs were tracked in high end studios, some in smaller home studios and others in living rooms with great acoustics.  I love how it's all sounding.

How You can Help:

I am now at a point where the music for album is nearly ready. But an album needs so much more than simply recording some great music. Here's what all the funds of this campaign are going towards:

  • Studio Costs: There's some recording left to do and studios cost money!

  • Paying the Musicians: All the musicians have played on my album gratis! I want to pay them for their efforts.

  • Mastering the Tracks: The tracks will be mastered by the amazing Chris Graham so the album sounds great whether you are listening to it in the car or at home.

  • Album Art: While one shouldn't judge an album by its cover, I'd still like to have a really cool one made.

  • Music Videos: Two of the tracks from my album will have music videos made for them.

  • Physical Copies: For those of you that are interested, I'd love to have some LPs, CDs and USBs of my album made. Something tangible is always nice.

  • Social Media Campaign: I want my music to really get out there. A great way reach the corners of the globe today is through social media promotion.  I will be running a campaign as soon as my tracks are mastered, artwork and videos are completed and the album is ready to be launched!

  • Indiegogo Fees: Yes people, Indiegogo costs money too. 

Give what you can. Like the famous tagline says"Every little helps". There are some great perks to go with this campaign as well. They're just my way of saying Thank You for all your support, so please don't forget to click "Get This Perk" instead of "Back It" if you want to claim one.

Other Ways You Can Help

I need more than just financial aid! Spread the word about my campaign, about my music! Tell your friends and family. Indiegogo has made that part of it really easy :).

Just click  one of the icons at the top of the page! 

Thank you for all the support!

story:
More about Pictures at an African Exhibition

       Sound Reformation and I have been performing this music for about the past three years with my regular band consisting of Zaccai Curtis on piano, Luques Curtis on bass, Wayne Smith Jr. on the drums, and our special guest Nasheet Waits on the drums.  The project has grown with each time we have performed the music, and we recently documented the music over the course of a year from 2015-2016, first with recording the small group, and then with the wind ensemble.  Finally, each piece of music is accompanied by an original work of art work, done by London based artist David Emmanuel Noel.

       Now in the final phase we are hoping to raise funds  for the mixing, mastering, packaging,  and distribution, as well as promotional and marketing cost.  With certain levels of contributions you will be able to receive some amazing perks such as early copies of the album, signed copies of the album, prints of the art work, and more!   This project is 100% completely independent and while our desired target mark is $6,000, if we do not reach this cost we will still put all contributions towards the completion of this project.  If we are fortunate enough to receive more than our desired cost we will use these funds to promote the album to the best of our ability to make it a success, and if we receive further funding from this campaign it would go towards the budget for recording the second part of this music and arts collaboration.    

     With art programs across the country constantly taking budget cuts and some being removed from the schools, I am hoping this project will be able to come to fruition to serve as an example for younger generations to come as to what is possible if they use their creative powers.  In this project I have drawn inspiration from African art and music, jazz music, classical music, as well as the artwork of David and other visual artists and much more to create this jazz symphony. I am also hopeful that with the themes we've explored in this project we can see that although we all have differences in our various cultures across the world, we all have more in common than we have differences.  

      Thank you for your time and consideration, and I hope you will find this project deserving of your support.  Even if you are not able to donate at this time, even spreading the words to friends and family about this project would be most appreciated and hopefully garner more support to bring it to life.  Once again, thank you.

 

Sincerely,

Darryl

story:
Campaign update (June 5, 2017)

 

Help us launch a brand new album!

Being a Do-It-Yourself artist is both challenging and rewarding these days, especially when it comes to the financial end. We love that so many dedicated music-lovers want to bypass labels and the big corporations and support us directly! We can't tell you how much we appreciate that.

Having said all that -  one thing you really need in order to do anything (ie. produce a great-sounding album, print merch, tour, etc.) -- is funding. So while we continue to write music, we're hoping you'll join us in this journey to the next step -- that is -- a new FULL-LENGTH ALBUM!

What better way to take this next step than with the help of our dearest fans and friends from all across the globe. We already wouldn't be here without you, and now you can also be a very big and important part in our future. YOU can help us, to give YOU the new music you've all been craving for. Let's show the world that true music fans can keep the real spirit of making and listening to music alive. No corporate suits, no middle-man. YOU want more ELYOSE, and we're more than happy to deliver.
 



What We Need & What You Get

Here’s how it works; by donating and selecting a perk, you directly contribute to the goal, a new ELYOSE album. We'll use the money we gather to finance the recording, mixing, mastering and pressing of the album.

We have selected a number of unique ELYOSE related items for sale, by which you contribute to our goal, our new record. Check out all our perks in the right-hand column.




 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute there are a lot other ways you can help us out!

  • Tell your friends about ELYOSE and this campaign. Get them excited!
  • Share the campaign on your social media networks.

     

Thanks a million - We can't wait to get started!!!

XOXO,

Justine, Ghislain, Marc and Patrick
story_txt:
Campaign update (June 5, 2017) Help us launch a brand new album!Being a Do-It-Yourself artist is both challenging and rewarding these days, especially when it comes to the financial end. We love that so many dedicated music-lovers want to bypass labels and the big corporations and support us directly! We can't tell you how much we appreciate that.Having said all that -  one thing you really need in order to do anything (ie. produce a great-sounding album, print merch, tour, etc.) -- is funding. So while we continue to write music, we're hoping you'll join us in this journey to the next step -- that is -- a new FULL-LENGTH ALBUM!What better way to take this next step than with the help of our dearest fans and friends from all across the globe. We already wouldn't be here without you, and now you can also be a very big and important part in our future. YOU can help us, to give YOU the new music you've all been craving for. Let's show the world that true music fans can keep the real spirit of making and listening to music alive. No corporate suits, no middle-man. YOU want more ELYOSE, and we're more than happy to deliver. What We Need & What You GetHere’s how it works; by donating and selecting a perk, you directly contribute to the goal, a new ELYOSE album. We'll use the money we gather to finance the recording, mixing, mastering and pressing of the album.We have selected a number of unique ELYOSE related items for sale, by which you contribute to our goal, our new record. Check out all our perks in the right-hand column. Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute there are a lot other ways you can help us out!
Tell your friends about ELYOSE and this campaign. Get them excited!
Share the campaign on your social media networks. 
Thanks a million - We can't wait to get started!!!XOXO,Justine, Ghislain, Marc and Patrick

story:
Hi, I'm Carys. I've spent the past five years performing, writing and recording in several different bands. I'm the vocalist in avant-garde rock band 'Code Indigo' and symphonic metal cover band 'Lightwish', one half of the duos 'David Wright and Carys', 'Celandine' and 'Freyja's Fire', and a solo performer in my own right.

My next step is to record a solo album of my own original material, which will be called “A Different Kind Of Normal”. If you know me, you'll now be smiling and thinking how appropriate that is, and if you don't know me yet...I have Asperger syndrome and Anxiety disorder, so I have a unique outlook on most things. Let's just say that I'm told life is never dull with me around!

Anyway, onto the album. The plan is to have thirteen tracks, mainly because I really, really like the number thirteen (I was born on Friday the 13th). As for the style of music, well...its me, and I've had a lot of fun trying to get past that description, because I write in a variety of styles depending on my mood. While the track listing isn't finalised yet, the album will begin with the first song I ever wrote back in 2005, the unaccompanied 'Siren Call' (you can hear a snatch in the video at the top of the page) and will include the folk-horror song 'Sir Dominick's Bargain', the Celandine track 'Beating the Streetlights Home (with Rosemary Griffith on vocals) and finish with 'Apocalypse Dreams, which I wrote about the dreams I had whilst on anxiety medication last year. Oh, and there's my death trilogy, which I promise is a lot more fun than it sounds! So if you want to know more about the workings of inside my head, you definitely need this album!

But I need you as well, because without your help I can't create the product I know this album deserves to be. While my studio costs are covered, I still need to pay for the actual glass mastering and CD production, artwork design, promotion... and before that I need to pay the lovely musicians who will be playing alongside me on the album! And that, of course,is where you come in! I've come up with some great rewards that I hope you're going to be interested in, from as basic and sensible as an album download to getting your name in the sleeve notes or me knitting you a scarf! I'll even come and sing at your house for you and your friends!

Even if you aren't able to help fund the album right now, I'd be very grateful if you would please share this link far and wide and tell your friends so as many people as possible get to see it. I'm really passionate about this project and I know with your help we can create an album to be proud of! Thank you.

And a huge thank you to everyone who's helped me so far...

David Wright for mastering the video soundtrack. Sue Manley for advice on making the video. Tilly Moses for fielding my random questions about indiegogo. Stephan Schelle for the amazing cover photo.

Photos featured in the video were taken by Sophie Watson, David Wright, Dave Massey, Michael Cooper, Jenni Williams, Lynne Beckley, Anton Uraletz and Stephan Schelle. Songs featured are Apocalypse Dreams, Face the Raven, all Copyright © Carys.

story:
The Story of "MANA":

While we were on tour in January of 2011, we had a last minute show cancellation and ended up playing a DIY house show in rural Pennsylvania.  We met a couple kids who came to see us play after finding out about us through myspace. It turns out they were DJ's at a nearby radio station and invited us to play a live set on-air the next day. At the station we met some truly wonderful human beings who would soon become the production team for our first full length album, "MANA". 


- WXLV studio owner and Emmy Award-winning sound designer Harry Snodgrass enthusiastically agreed to act as producer for the album. He designed sound for Napoleon Dynamite, Alien 3, South Park and hundreds of other projects. FUN FACT: he made the "DUN DUN" sound in Law and Order! 


- Benjamin Fenstermaker, the enormously talented visual artist who designed the album artwork seen above.


- Vince Dejesus, Erich Hamill, Jared Gibson and a slew of other students who would spend hundreds of hours editing, mixing and tinkering with gigantic session files in Pro Tools... All while juggling a full load of college classes, part-time jobs and creative projects of their own.


"MANA" is an album created and built on the generosity and creativity of numerous people brought together by what seemed like coincidence, but has proven itself to be much more.


Where We Are Now:

Almost a year later we are in the final stages of completing this album! After spending 8 months of late nights in the studio and even longer road trips from Baltimore, MD to Allentown, PA, we handed off our mixes to the enormously talented mixing engineer Kevin Bernsten at Developing Nations Studio. 


After completing mixes, the album will be sent to an equally talented engineer - Carl Saff of Chicago - to be mastered for both vinyl and CD/digital release in March 2012.


Altogether, that's over ONE YEAR spent working on SEVEN SONGS. Needless to say, we have poured our BLOOD, SWEAT and TEARS into this project and need your help to finish it off.


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP and WHY THIS PROJECT IS SPECIAL:

Quite simply, we have reached the end of our ropes financially. As two recent college graduates who made the decision to be full-time musicians in addition to our day jobs, we have an extremely limited amount of money we can use on the project at a time. Up until this point, we have funded every step of the album's production ourselves and simply cannot finish it without the help of outside supporters like YOU!


This project is so special because it would have never materialized if it weren't for the kindness, dedication and hard work of complete strangers who eventually became close friends. That idea is what brought us to the album title "MANA" which is a polynesian word that means spiritual energy or power that resides in the essence of particularly vibrant, life-affirming individuals. We think this record is brimming with mana. And to push forward in this idea of community, altruism and interconnectivity, we are asking for complete strangers like YOU to help us finish this project and give it the due process it deserves.


We need your help to not only pay for the remaining costs of the record's production (i.e. mixing, mastering, printing, etc.), but also to HELP US FUND OUR NATIONAL TOUR TO THE SOUTH BY SOUTHWEST (SXSW) FESTIVAL IN AUSTIN, TEXAS THIS MARCH! The opportunity to play at SXSW is a huge achievement for this band and we are passionate about showing this album to as many people as possible. Simply put, we can't even afford to finish paying off this album without outside assistance, nevermind pay for all the costs of touring - renting a van, gas, etc. That's where your help comes in.


We are extremely frugal individuals. We sleep in vans. We eat Ramen Noodles in industrial amounts. Bottom line - the $5,000 we are asking for will go towards paying for the absolute essentials of this album and tour - NO FRILLS, NO LUXURIES, NO WASTE. We are here to make music and spread love to others, not to be comfortable or live a life of egotism.


The Bottom Line:

We need your help to finish this record and then show it to the world on a tour halfway across the country to debut it at South By Southwest (SXSW) in Austin TX, one of the nation's biggest music conferences! Please donate whatever you can, anything helps!


Please watch the video above for sneak peeks of the new album, some glimpses into how we made it and some shots with the wonderful people who helped us get here. THANK YOU!!!


Here is a sneak peak at our album artwork... (Outside Panels followed by Inside Panels). All artwork by Benjamin Fenstermaker.






Contact Time Columns: timecolumns@gmail.com

Free Album Downloads and Live Recordings: http://timecolumns.bandcamp.com

Videos: http://www.youtube.com/timecolumns

Like us on facebook!: http://www.facebook.com/timecolumns

story:
Our Story



ALTHOUGH this campaign has now ended, if you would like to be part of the team, you can choose your perks and gifts and still be involved in the making of my video. If you have PAYPAL, contributions can be sent to lorigvideo@gmail.com. THANK YOU so much and have a Merry Christmas. Lori xoxo


                                                          ***NEWS FLASH ***

                                                     2CDs for the price of 1!!!

If you jump on board with a $35 contribution, NOT ONLY will you receive an autographed copy of my upcoming CD, "NO ORDINARY GIRL" but you will also receive a Limited Edition Cd by Gisel De Marco who many compare to Celine Dion, Whitney Houston and Mariah Carey. You can hear Gisel's beautiful music and voice here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rc07rgBWSuw

PLUS ~ As a special gift to you, EVERY person who contributes to my campaign, regardless of the amount, will also see his/her name listed on the credits of the new video. How cool is that? To be publicly acknowledged to say that you helped fund my video? I think that's waaaaaaaaaaaay cool!
                                                                ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Lori Greco is an independent musician, singer and songwriter and music has always been at the heart and soul of her life. Studying the piano from the age of 7 through to University level and performing on radio, television, to corporate gigs and audiences of thousands, she was encouraged to record her own music. In 2007 she self funded an album of 12 original songs called "WAITING". Samples of the 12 songs from her first album can be heard here : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXbzJK25ID4&feature=youtu.be&a


As they say ~ once bitten, but definitely not so shy, through the success of her first album, Lori had caught the "recording bug" and wanted to record another album. She joined the crowd sourcing site at https://www.sellaband.com/ and raised $50,000 through the help of 412 amazing fans from all corners of the world and is now in the process of completing her soon-to-be released album of 13 original tracks called "No Ordinary Girl." The release date is anticipated to be September, 2013.


Included in this video, are samples from her next album, although they are not the singles. Beginning with "Tu Lo Sai", a soulful song written in Italian, as she is looks to break into the Italian market, to the introduction to a country waltz ballad, played on her piano at home called "The Courage You Lack" and finishing with the vocals to the title of her album, "No Ordinary Girl."


Understanding the need for catchy hooks and beautiful melodies, coupled with the combination of fantastic musicians for the success of her new album, some of the greatest session musicians in the world have joined Lori to help make "No Ordinary Girl" a true work of musical art.  With Steve Gadd (drums), Abe Laboriel Snr (bass), and special guests Andy Snitzer (saxophone), Romeo Scaccia (piano), and Lucky Oceans (pedal-steel guitar), plus the best of musicians from her home city of Perth, this album is certain to ignite media attention, venturing where no other Australian artist has ever dared and she looks forward to the promotion of her new album.




The Impact


The album is currently still in the editing phase and Lori looks forward to it's release in 2013. She is now looking to raise funds to record a new music video for the first single off the album.



What We Need & What You Get


Lori's goal is to raise a budget of $5,500 for the filming of a professional music video which will help in the promotion of the song for use in every possible avenue to reach a greater audience. This budget will cover all aspects of the filming to the completion of the video. If only part of the goal is reached, she will add funds to complete the video and all contributors will still be rewarded with their perks. If per chance, she raises well over this amount (fingers crossed) the money will go towards promotion of the album and video with the possibility to record a second video.



Other Ways You Can Help

This is an opportunity for you to help an Indie Artist reach another dream. Lori Greco is hard working, talented and truly appreciates those who help spread the word about her music. She has worked all her life for this moment. It's her time for success and now it's your chance to help, in as little or as much as you wish. Very soon, she is confident of presenting to you a CD that is not only sonically incredible, but musically will appeal to all tastes.

So please take a look at the perks to the right of your screen to see if there is anything that suits you. Please know that your donation is helping Lori Greco take another step towards realizing a dream.

Finally, please "DIWO!" That is, "Do It With Others." Please share the link to this campaign and let's spread the word and reach the goal of $5,500 as soon as possible. Please note, all items will be posted in the one package, meaning that if you have ordered the CD or video, both must have been completed before your package is posted, to cut down on postage fees.  Thank you for your understanding and patience. Skype calls will be scheduled at a mutually convenient time.

Have the most fantastic day and thank you..wherever you are...... for your help! <3
