story:
For Love of Children (FLOC) is a volunteer group that raises funds to provide enrichment and educational support for the neglected, abused, and foster care children of our greater Dayton area. The organization has worked with a population of approximately 6000 children in our community. The current reality of statistics regarding this population is frightening. 70% of our inner city youth cannot pass the mandatory OGT (Ohio Grad...uate Test). Of that 70%, it is estimated that 80% of those children become our homeless. We are really working with a three tiered population- children who are abused or neglected, or in foster care, (one), the emancipated youth who have little to no support (two) and eventually, the homeless (three). When our current board assembled four years ago, the youth in the first category were subsidized through our government by a yearly allotment of $2500; we came into a very damaged, shattered system. In the past four years, FLOC has been very actively fundraising; our efforts have collected over $170,000 for our kids. Because we are a full-fledged volunteer agency with no paid staff, we have been able to donate these funds on a 100% basis. Any interest in volunteering with our organization will be immediately recognized with great appreciation.

The afternoon activities include outdoor games and events beginning with the incredible DJ Fatty Lumpkin (Status Flo/Skratchmatik) on the 1's and 2's playing music for your enjoyment, followed by live acoustic and music performances by Skilless Villains, Matter of Chance, and Stephanie Westfall. Next, for extra flavor, an extensive and talented lineup of local comedians will share their talents for some much needed comic relief.

The list of comedians is as follows

Jovan Runyon
Carla Brittain
Steve Mac
Jeremy Johnson
Drew Donisi

Mike Etienne
Daren Christian
Lori Graves
Andre Clark
Nate Washington
Kenny Carpenter
And Emcee Adrian Cosby

Last but not least the night concludes with Hip-Hop music from Many Stylez, Status Flo, and finally Bless performing for his album release "Because Language Equals Sound Shaping".

Booths and representatives will be available for donations, merchandise sales, and sponsorship information. Families and kids of all ages are welcome. There will be games, dancing, food, face painting, merchandise raffles, etc., so come out and have some fun, all while showing support for this great charity organization and local musicians and artists, as well as those involved in taking the time to improve the lives of others.

The Comedy and Hip-Hop show in the evening will be 21+ and we are asking a donation of $20.00 to attend, all of which will go to FLOC.

For more information regarding anyone involved in organizing, performing at, or sponsoring this event, just feel free to ask!

www.flocdayton.org
http://BlessTheMusic.com/
http://SmartPeopleMusic.co

Beth Entingh
937-451-0314
bethit25@yahoo.com
www.facebook.com/bethit25

relief. The list of comedians is as followsJovan RunyonCarla BrittainSteve MacJeremy JohnsonDrew DonisiMike EtienneDaren ChristianLori GravesAndre ClarkNate WashingtonKenny CarpenterAnd Emcee Adrian CosbyLast
 but not least the night concludes with Hip-Hop music from Many Stylez, 
Status Flo, and finally Bless performing for his album release "Because 
Language Equals Sound Shaping". Booths and representatives will 
be available for donations, merchandise sales, and sponsorship 
information. Families and kids of all ages are welcome. There will be 
games, dancing, food, face painting, merchandise raffles, etc., so come 
out and have some fun, all while showing support for this great charity 
organization and local musicians and artists, as well as those involved 
in taking the time to improve the lives of others. The Comedy 
and Hip-Hop show in the evening will be 21+ and we are asking a donation
 of $20.00 to attend, all of which will go to FLOC.For more information regarding anyone involved in organizing, performing at, or sponsoring this event, just feel free to ask!www.flocdayton.orghttp://BlessTheMusic.com/http://SmartPeopleMusic.coBeth Entingh 937-451-0314bethit25@yahoo.comwww.facebook.com/bethit25

story:
What is the purpose of the project?

The main purpose of this instructional DVD will be to show how to develop the grooves and fills in all popular styles, while exploring the differences that make them unique!

What inspired this project?

I love playing in all styles of music, and I wanted to share that knowledge with others. I felt the best the medium to do this in was an instructional DVD.  My hope is that I will inspire other drummers to explore other genres, and eventually, help them further their own music careers.

My story:

I grew up in Greece, and since the age of 12, I've had a dream to become one of the best drummers in the world. I've been playing professionally in a variety of genres and with many different types of musicians and artists for over 12 years. Now, I'm attending Berklee College of Music on a scholarship, and continuing to play and tour with professionals such as Mario Frangoulis, my band Sunburst, and other artists in the Boston area. 

Where you come in:

Your support will help me on my journey towards establishing myself as a professional drummer and teacher, as well as help the countless that will benefit from the DVD.

Thank you!

-Kostas Milonas

 

Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/kostasdrum

YouTube Channel:https://www.youtube.com/user/mrmilonas


Twitter:https://twitter.com/kostasdrum

story:
We know you guys are incredibly passionate about UK TECH-METAL FEST and so we have decided to set up a fundraising campaign so that those who would like to contribute to our efforts are able to!

There is no pressure to donate, UKTMF 2013 is going ahead no matter what, we are deep into the planning stages and we have some very big ambitions to achieve this year. We always want to improve and make UKTMF the best we can for the bands and fans alike.

Expansion in all directions is our target this year, we want to bring you bigger headliners, more international bands, bigger venues, bigger sound systems, bigger crowds and accomodation at the festival for all those who attend!!!

Please share this link far and wide, please donate anything you can, all profits will be used for expanding/improving UKTMF 2013 in all areas.

Feel free to set up a local UKTMF fundraiser show with your local music scene!!! Contact us at techfest@hotmail.co.uk with your plan for running and organising your own UKTMF fundraiser and we will help work with you to promote the Event and Help you find some awesome bands to play it.

Big thanks to everyone who has supported UKTMF so far, we appreciate your efforts as this event would not be possible without such a dedicated loyal fan base <3 - Simon

http://www.facebook.com/uktechfest

story:
Hello!!

We are Sister Sin from Gothenburg, Sweden. The band formed in 2003 and since then we have released three albums and toured in the US numerous times as well in Europe. We love being on the road and playing live for our fans. Touring much needs a good and a reliable vehicle.

A few months ago we bought a van for the band and since then it has done a good amount of miles. Yesterday(14th of July) we drove back home from a gig and our beloved van broke down completely and went to car heaven.

The timing couldn´t be worse since we have a packed schedule ahead of us.
We have upcoming tours in Sweden,Russia, Spain, Belgium, Germany and the UK so we are seeking donations to help fund a new van which is essential for our fall touring.

For each donation we will provide limited edition Sister Sin merchandise depending on the size of the donation.

we plan on buying a van for around 15,000$ but we don´t have all the means to cover it ourselves. In need of 4000$ but anything helps!

Keep in touch with us at FACEBOOK or on our HOMEPAGE

All the best;

Liv,Jimmy,Dave & Strandh

SISTER SIN
